action.msg: What did you do to my bunnies-
Oh, nothing much.
I just figured they'd be doing better off if they followed my flow some more.
Besides, this could be a fun way of me making up for missing your show.
What's so funny? Cherry, take them back!
Aww. But I'm really comfortable in this spot.
WE'RE ON A MOVING LIMO?
And the songs are so soothing...
I gotta agree. I'm falling asleep behind the wheel!
I'm going to tear your limbs off one by one.
HEY LEAVE ME THE FUCK OUTTA THIS!
I'M NOT TALKING TO YOU. GOD.
WHY IS EVERYONE IN THIS TOWN INSANE?
Come on- I'm trying to make it up to you here.
You think that YOU can entertain me with your idea of a weak ass show? Even after all that, you wanna humiliate me some more?
I SAID I WAS SORRY.
Seriously, this town is FULL of people from space, and you think I'm still lying to you?
You don't even REALIZE the shit I went through while in prison. I'm lucky they haven't even found me yet!
You're insane.
I'm not! I'm-
You were always crazy. And stupid. And loud. And didn't know when to shut up.
And yet, right now, as much as I want to strangle you...
I just.. fucking can't. I can't.
If you're telling the truth, and I can still hardly believe you, then this was all just a waste of time.
But I really HOPE you are. That point of my life, having to tackle crowds, wondering if my friend would ever show up...
I really, really wanted to make it.
You think this star is just a fashion accessory? I literally CANNOT remove this. I have to sleep with this little reminder that I'm being hunted.
At least it looks cool.
Yeah it looks rad.
Thanks Cherry.
I think I'm gonna fucking vomit.
I can't believe this.
Whatever. I'll listen to your dumbass story of "space travels"
What could they even want from you? You're a total softie.
That's cap and you know it.
Fuck it. It'd be nice to perform without an audience watching for once.
I dunno if you can keep up with me, though. I'm probably leagues above you now.
Let's see. You first.
